edu.proj1.compute

Class Formula

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.proj1.compute.Formula

  • public class Formula
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for the various computations related to the Fire Danger Legacy System

      • getBuildupIndex

        public static double getBuildupIndex(double buo,
                     double precip)
        Calculates the Buildup Index
        Parameters:
        buo - - Yesterday's buildup
        precip - - the past 24 hours of precipitation in inches and hundredths

      • getFineFuelMoisture

        public static double getFineFuelMoisture(double dryWet)
        Calculates the Fine Fuel Moisture A and B are the piecewise regression coefficients used to determine FFM. The depression of the wet bulb is used to decide which set of A and B will be used. Herb stage is used to adjust the calculated fine fuel moisture by adding 5 percent for transition stage or 10-percent for green fuels.
        Parameters:
        dryWet - - dry-wet in degrees farenheit

      • getAdjustedFuelMoisture

        public static double getAdjustedFuelMoisture(double ffm,
                             double bui)
        Calculates the Adjusted Fuel Moisture
        Parameters:
        ffm - - the current Fine Fuel Moisture
        bui - - today's Buildup Index Recovery

      • getFineFuelSpread

        public static double getFineFuelSpread(double wind,
                       double ffm)
        Calculates the Fine Fuel Spread for grass
        Parameters:
        wind - - Windspeed in m.p.h., 20 feet above open level ground
        ffm - - the current Fine Fuel Moisture

      • getTimberSpreadIndex

        public static double getTimberSpreadIndex(double wind,
                          double adfm)
        Calculates the Timber Spread Index
        Parameters:
        wind - - Windspeed in m.p.h., 20 feet above open level ground
        adfm - - Fuel moisture adjusted for 50-day timelag

      • getFireLoadIndex

        public static double getFireLoadIndex(double tsi,
                      double bui)
        Calculates the Fire Load Index
        Parameters:
        tsi - - Timber Spread Index
        bui - - Buildup Index
